mapper.sql: id, created_by, created_time, last_modified_by, last_modified_time, code, name, menu_id, describe_
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ( t2.`permission` ) FROM sys_role_res t1 JOIN sys_resource t2 ON t1.res_id = t2.id JOIN sys_user_role t3 ON t3.role_id = t1.role_id JOIN sys_role t4 ON t3.role_id = t4.id WHERE t2.permission is not null and t2.deleted = 0 AND t3.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT CONCAT(',',GROUP_CONCAT(T2.id)) tree_path FROM ( SELECT @r AS r_id, ( SELECT @r := parent_id FROM sys_resource WHERE id = r_id ) AS parent_id, @l := @l + 1 AS lvl FROM ( SELECT @r := #{parentId}, @l := 0 ) vars, sys_resource h WHERE @r != 0 ) T1 JOIN sys_resource T2 ON T1.r_id = T2.id
